column2: "/ci1 1 Oh, well hello there. Think you could lend me a hand here?"
"/ci2 1 ...Thanks for the help. Good luck out there."
"/ci4 3 Things are looking bad! Sorry, I'm going to withdraw."
"/ci5 3 No... Not like this..."

"/ci1 2 Hey, you over there! Think you could lend a hand?"
"/ci2 1  Yeah, that's what I thought. Thanks, you really help--... N-No, it's nothing!"
"/ci5 3 Nooo! We were so close...!"
